name: Witch Academy Another Battle
description:
Rescue your captured friends!
Destroy the approaching enemies with your gun and free your captured friends!
The released allies will be available for use from the next battle.

After defeating the final boss, you can keep all the girls naked forever.
When you defeat the final boss and start a new game, you can select the naked option on the options screen.


Hi. You're the magician partner, right?
Hh, Nice to meet you.
As you may have heard, my comrades have been captured by the enemy.
I think they are probably planning to use everyone's magical power to attack us.
Before that happens, I want to rescue everyone.
Do you get it?
We've set up teleportation magic so that we can invade the enemy's location at any time, so we'll go as soon as we're ready.
By the way, we can also train here, and if necessary, we can generate items using alchemy.
I don't want to think about it, but if I can't win, I have no choice but to train and get stronger.
Also, alchemy involves magical power, and high-level items cannot be created without high magical power.
And, The way to raise the level of magic power is,,,
Well.
You know.
We'll definitely help everyone.


To win the battle, level up girl's erogenous zones and strengthen girl's weapons and abilities.

Use items to grow efficiently.
Obtain items by performing alchemy.
What if I fail? ?
Girls moan lewdly according to their ecstasy level.
As the level increases, 3P and more are possible.

During sex, you can use your favorite naughty commands until the girl's physical strength reaches 0.
The erogenous zones that can be developed are different for each command.
Erogenous zones level up as you accumulate experience points. A new command is released.
Some commands can only be executed by obtaining items through alchemy, so be sure to use alchemy efficiently.
For some commands, the girl will react by scrolling the mouse wheel. (vibrator and sex)
Place the mouse cursor on the nipple and clitoris for the rotor, and click on the mouth and clitoris for the kiss. The command will be executed during the click.
Sex machines automatically increase your ecstasy and experience points while you use them.


SEX positions include missionary, doggy style, standing doggy style, cowgirl, threesome, and orgy play.
Aim for climax by making full use of multiple SEX commands.
Kissing, insertion, rotor torture, vibrator torture, anal vibrator, anal penetration, blowjob, ejaculation.
Sex machines that are essential for training are vaginal development machines, anal development machines, breast pumping machines, nipple ejaculation machines, double vibrator machines, and blowjob development machines.

How to control the player.
Move the camera view: Press the left or right mouse button to move the mouse.
Move up: W
Move right: D
Move left: A
Move down: S
Jump: Space
Firing weapon: left mouse click
Aiming: press right mouse button
Grenade: Q
Melee : E
Weapon switching: 1/2/3
